conversations.body_text: Hi Steffen Glapa,  We sincerely apologize that the pedals are currently sold out at our German warehouse. We will ship them to you via DHL after restocking this week.

Dear Team,

Can i expect the Delivery this year?
Its for over a week announct by DHL...
I cant do anything with the First shipment without the Delivery...

Thanks for a answer!

Mfg
Steffen Glapa

service@simsonn.com
Hi Steffen Glapa,  ​It will be sent to you this week and will arrive in about a week.

Dear Team,

When will the restock Take place in your Germany Warehouse im waiting now
for over a Month for my Pedals ?

Thanks

Steffen Glapa

service@simsonn.com
Hi simsonn Team they dont have arrived since about 1 Month!
